GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, sortable by various fields

queries.name: sort_by
queries.description: Specify the field to sort articles by. Acceptable values: 'author', 'title', 'article_id', 'topic', 'created_at', 'votes', 'article_img_url', 'comment_count'.

queries.name: order
queries.description: Specify the order of sorting. Acceptable values: 'asc' for ascending, 'desc' for descending.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: fetches an article by its ID

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: fetches an array of comments for a given article ID

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes of an article by the given article_id

requestBody.inc_votes: an integer representing how much to increment or decrement the votes by

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by its ID

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
